message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the recommendation, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $150?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. However, I have to make a profit on this sale. I can meet you halfway, but I need to charge at least $175. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product. I hope this meets your requirements.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $165, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about we aim for $170?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could you possibly lower the price to $160?
I understand you're really trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $162.50, but I'm not going any lower than that.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product. I hope this meets your needs.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll meet you at $162, but that's as low as I can go.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to propose a price of $158 for the product. I hope this helps us come to a resolution.
